info.name: Redmine Tomorrow Dark
info.description: A dark theme based on the base16-tomorrow dark color palette.
info.additionalInfo: A flat dark color scheme based off the base16-tomorrow dark color palette. It kind of sucks, but it's easier on the eyes than the bright white of standard Redmine. As always, THANKS to Chris Kempson for the base16 color palettes (http://chriskempson.github.io/base16/)! Changelog 1.0 - Created. 1.0.1 - Updated background color on html for short pages. 1.0.2 - Added flash notice color. 1.0.3 - Added code for pre. 1.1 - Fixed issue with previews and tags plugin I use.

data.title: Nice! Can you add the following for the gantt table?
